post:
We're introducing our new project Invpsus.com - We believe in generosity and were struggling to make an offer that combines generous resource allotments, premium enterprise-grade hardware and experienced support. And now you can get all that at a very affordable price. Since 2003 Internet and Software services have been devoted to providing quality hosting services worldwide. We have been doing web hosting services for over 11 years under the brands Hostony and FastNext. We have answered over 1 500 000 tickets since our start. We are passionate about hosting, hardware and cloud. We are very proud to have been chosen as a trusted provider by numerous customers to handle all of their hosting needs for many years.

Our Features:
- With our VPS plans you will get really big memory and ssd disk allotments.
- Your RAM and Disk allotments are dedicated and guaranteed.
- Our VPSes are based on KVM virtualization.

All of our Vps Hosting plans come with a 30 day money back guarantee:

VPS hosting plans #1

Why Choose US?
1) No waiting - Just order, pay and receive your VPS server in seconds. SSD VPS is about speed and performance right from the start.
2) Pure SSD storage - We use only SSD disks. It guarantees best read and write speeds for your VPS and will improve performance of your site dramatically.
3) Outstanding Support - We are always here to help. We will transfer your website at no cost and will consult on any server settings you might need for your project.
4) KVM Virtualization - Our KVM virtualized VPSes are designed to address a high level of security and performance.
5) Best Control Panels - To manage and administer your virtual machine, you can optionally choose between Parallels Plesk and cPanel/WHM. Enjoy the best software and user experience in the industry.
6) Backup - Every day after the midnight we copy all the data from your VPS to the separate backup partition. All information is stored for 7 days. This is your guarantee of safety and data loss prevention.

If you have any questions, we're always ready to assist:
- Technical Support (Well-trained, helpful and friendly technical support)
Send us an email to support@invpsus.com
- Customer Service (For assistance with sales, billing and account management questions)
Send us an email to cs@invpsus.com
